unnormalised: Okay, so return policies, right? Crucial! My cousin Priya bought a saree online for Diwali from "Fancy Fabrics, Delhi," but the color was totally off! Thankfully, their return was easy. Imagine the hassle otherwise! Like getting stale biryani at an Onam sadhya! Check that policy, yaar. Nobody wants a refund fight! Good stuff!
